name: 1.3.1.Final
body:
- [**Bug**] Fix serdes layer use of the new client. [#843](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/843)
- [**Bug**] Versioned metadata doesn't return properties, labels and modifiedOn [#832](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/832)
- [**Task**] Release script should change product version inside OpenAPI file definition [#831](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/831)
- [**Enhancement**] Provide ability to add addtional headers to registry client requests [#827](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/827)
- [**Bug**] Versioned delete of artifacts and metadata can leave orphan records [#824](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/824)
- [**Enhancement**] Add a `NONE` config option to the Compatibility rule [#820](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/820)
- [**closed**] JPA Bug: Metadata not deleting when state updated to DELETED [#819](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/819)
- [**Bug**] Client not compatible with Jersey [#808](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/808)
- [**closed**] Maven plugin always downloads .avsc file extension even registred non Avro schema [#806](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/806)
- [**Discussion**] Artifacts in DISABLED state are not viewable? [#788](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/788)
- [**Quality**] Allow users to define Kafka Streams topic names [#768](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/768)
- [**Enhancement**] Set global rules in a programmatic way [#750](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/750)
- [**Bug**] Bug with USE_SPECIFIC_AVRO_READER config param [#737](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/737)
- [**Discussion**][**Enhancement**] Disallow empty content [#717](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/717)
- [**Bug**] Serdes jar does not include all dependencies [#702](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/702)
- [**Enhancement**] Global rule set via env variable [#701](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/701)
- [**Bug**] NPE searching for artifacts via Streams storage variant with multiple pods [#661](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/661)
- [**Enhancement**] Option to use Avro schemas with JSON encoding [#643](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/643)
- [**Enhancement**] "Clean" Avro option for Avro serialiser and deserializer [#642](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/642)
- [**Enhancement**] Create a combined SerDe for Kafka Streams use of Avro [#641](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/641)
- [**Bug**] Superfluous files in connector distribution [#497](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/497)
- [**Enhancement**] Improve metadata [#361](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/361)
